languages.text: "Свет? Здесь больше нет света, Ваша Светлость. Лишь тени прошлого".

traits.locale_text: {n}Будто от спазма, Вайс до крови прикусывает губу, стараясь сдержать гримасу боли.{/n} "Нет, Ваша Светлость... Всё будет хорошо. Аделина никогда не делала что-то вопреки моей воле".

languages.text: "Light? There is no light here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, not anymore. Only shadows of the past."
languages.original_text: "Свет? Здесь больше нет света, Ваша Светлость. Лишь тени прошлого".

traits.locale_text: "Light? There is no light here anymore, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Only shadows of the past."
"Light? There is no light here anymore, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Only shadows of the past."

"Light? There is no light here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, not anymore. Only shadows of the past."

languages.text: «¿A la luz? Aquí no hay ninguna luz, mi{mf|lord|lady}, ya no. Solo están las sombras del pasado».
languages.original_text: "Light? There is no light here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, not anymore. Only shadows of the past."

traits.locale_text: «¿A la luz? Aquí no hay ninguna luz, mi{mf|lord|lady}, ya no. Solo están las sombras del pasado».

languages.text: 「光り…？ここにはもう光などないさ、陛下。あるのは過去の影だけだ」
languages.original_text: "Light? There is no light here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, not anymore. Only shadows of the past."

traits.locale_text: 「光り…？ここにはもう光などないさ、陛下。あるのは過去の影だけだ」

languages.text: “明光？这里已经没有什么明光了，大人，不再有了。这里只有来自过去的阴影。”
languages.original_text: "Light? There is no light here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, not anymore. Only shadows of the past."

traits.locale_text: “明光？这里已经没有什么明光了，大人，不再有了。这里只有来自过去的阴影。”

languages.text: "Licht? Hier gibt es kein Licht, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, nicht mehr. Nur Schatten der Vergangenheit."
languages.original_text: "Light? There is no light here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, not anymore. Only shadows of the past."

traits.locale_text: "Licht? Hier gibt es kein Licht, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, nicht mehr. Nur Schatten der Vergangenheit."

languages.text: « Quel jour ? Il n'y a pas de lumière ici, Votre Seigneurie, plus maintenant. Il ne reste plus que les ombres du passé. »
languages.original_text: "Light? There is no light here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, not anymore. Only shadows of the past."

traits.locale_text: « Quel jour ? Il n'y a pas de lumière ici, Votre Seigneurie, plus maintenant. Il ne reste plus que les ombres du passé. »

languages.text: "Işık mı? Burada ışık yok {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Artık hiç ışıltı yok. Yalnızca geçmişin gölgeleri var."
languages.original_text: "Light? There is no light here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, not anymore. Only shadows of the past."
